attributes.action: bring self defence and personal safety lessons to be brought into the National Curriculum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to bring self defence classes into the national curriculum. Some schools already have outside coaches brought in to teach young people basic knowledge on how to stay safe. By having it taught to all young people it could help prevent them getting into dangerous situations and teach people to be aware.
